info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 14 at 3:59PM MDT until May 14 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southwestern Otero County in south central New Mexico... East central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... Southern Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico... El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 600 PM MDT.
* At 357 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over West El Paso.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong winds up to 40 to 50 mph.
SOURCE...New Mexico State Police.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 110 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 32. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 9. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 156. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 32.
Locations impacted include... West El Paso, East El Paso, Central El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Chaparral, Horizon City, Santa Teresa, Vado, Orogrande, Las Cruces, Anthony, Hueco Tanks, White Sands Missile Range Headquarters, Sunland Park, Afton, Anthony Gap, NMSU Main Campus, and Canutillo.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Luna, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX
